intro: Psychotria deinocalyx, commonly known as the pink psychotria, is a flowering plant native to Central and South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its striking pink to red flowers and elliptical, glossy leaves. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forests and undergrowth. Psychotria deinocalyx is also noted for its ornamental value and is sometimes cultivated for its vibrant blooms.
